Package com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service

Class BookService

java.lang.Object
com.jacobrymsza.librarymanagementsystem.service.BookService
@Service public class BookService extends Object
Service class for managing Book entities. Handles business logic related to books in the library system.

  • Method Details

    • createBook

      public BookDTO createBook(BookDTO bookDTO)
      Creates a new book in the library system.
      Parameters:
      bookDTO - the data transfer object containing book details
      Returns:
      the created BookDTO with assigned ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no authors are provided or specified authors are not found

    • updateBook

      public BookDTO updateBook(Long id, BookDTO bookDTO)
      Updates an existing book identified by the given ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book to update
      bookDTO - the data transfer object with updated book details
      Returns:
      the updated BookDTO
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book or specified authors are not found

    • deleteBook

      public void deleteBook(Long id)
      Deletes a book from the library system by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID of the book to delete
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the book with the specified ID is not found

    • getAllBooks

      public List<BookDTO> getAllBooks()
      Retrieves a list of all books in the library system. This method fetches all book entities from the data source, converts them into BookDTO objects, and returns them as a list. Each BookDTO contains basic book information (ID, title, ISBN) along with a list of author names.
      Returns:
      a List of BookDTO objects representing all books in the system

    • getBookById

      public BookDTO getBookById(Long bookId)
      Retrieves a book by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      bookId - the unique identifier of the book to retrieve
      Returns:
      the BookDTO object associated with the given ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if no book with the specified ID is found

    • getBookByIsbn

      public BookDTO getBookByIsbn(String isbn)
      Retrieves a book by its ISBN number.
      Parameters:
      isbn - the ISBN number of the book to retrieve
      Returns:
      the BookDTO object associated with the given ISBN, or null if no book is found

    • saveBook

      public void saveBook(Book book)
      Saves a book to the repository.
      Parameters:
      book - the Book object to be saved
